channel.title: OS-Reborn - Bringing Oldschool Back with Pride!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://os-reborn.com/images/styles/DeFraction/style_red/logo.png[/img]
[B]Links[/B] [url=http://os-reborn.com/]http://os-reborn.com/[/url] [url=http://os-reborn.com/forum.php]http://os-reborn.com/forum.php[/url] [url=http://os-reborn.com/OS-RebornClient.jar]http://os-reborn.com/OS-RebornClient.jar[/url]
[B][U]About OS-Reborn[/U][/B]
Welcome to OS-Reborn. OS-Reborn is a Runescape private server based on the 2008 era of runescape. OS-Reborn is owned by myself, Brian, Ethan, and Eric. Our goal is to emulate runescape at it's glorious times and bring you all a game that will hopefully succeed in catering to that goal. We have big plans and an excellent future ahead of us.
[B][U]What makes us different? [/U][/B]What makes OS-Reborn different from the other runescape remakes? Our main goal is to provide a safe and enjoyable gaming environment for our community. We hope that our users feel safe on our website and enjoy the game just as much as our developers enjoy programming it. We plan on releasing daily updates/patch notes in order to keep the game running smooth and up to date. Our motto is "Power to the players, NOT the staff". Coming from a professional standard, our viewing of a game depends on the players. What we are trying to say is that, why should we come up with the content? We believe our players should be the holders of that. We will let YOU, the player, decide the future and future content that will be added to OS-Reborn. Every week, we will poll 5 possible content additions and the top 2 will be added into the game. [SPOILER=Features][LEFT] [ul][COLOR="#00FF00"] [*]x17.5 xp [*]Grand Exchange [*]Quests [*]10+ Minigames [*]ALL Runescape locations [*]23 Functional Skills [*]Multi-World support [*]Random Events [*]Tutorial Island [*]Music System [*]ALL Runescape dialogues [*]Request Assistance System([URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Assist_System"]See RuneScape Wiki[/URL]) [*]Active community events(Player & staff hosted) [*]x17.5 experience rate [*]Boat travelling [*]Gravestone system [*]Falador party room [*]Character appperance [*]Clan Chat [*]Report abuse System [*]ALL Special attacks(with poisoning) [*]Duel arena[/COLOR][/ul] [/LEFT][/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Advert][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hH7n7gv.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7u0B/ef55ce852f.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7tYv/496e732d12.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7tHH/05cb4925b1.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7u7J/956b95b280.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7udB/f045b74430.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7vLl/6009e50b38.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7AuB/961e9e7783.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7FJL/abcbc7e337.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7FRh/011fdf453f.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7JUR/cd4296e2c5.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/e7JXn/fae5d6a602.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: OS-Reborn - Bringing Oldschool Back with Pride!
item.dc:creator: @Titanium1 Titanium_
item.description:
@Titanium1 wrote:

1/12/15 Updates: http://os-reborn.com/showthread.php?83-1-12-15-Updates

Other Notes:

To keep everyone interested about OS-Reborn, our development team decided it is time to announce some upcoming updates that are currently in development.

Achievement Diaries
Fist of Guthix
Quests: Lunar Diplomacy, Monkey Madness
Barbarian Assault
Construction

we have quite some more coming within the next two weeks as well, but we thought that we would give you all a run down on some of the major updates you will be seeing soon.

Regards,

OS-Reborn Development Team, Titanium, Jacob`, and Kayla.

Read full topic
item.source: OS-Reborn - Bringing Oldschool Back with Pride!

[CENTER]

[B]Links[/B]
http://os-reborn.com/
http://os-reborn.com/forum.php
http://os-reborn.com/OS-RebornClient.jar

[B][U]About OS-Reborn[/U][/B]

Welcome to OS-Reborn. OS-Reborn is a Runescape private server based on the 2008 era of runescape. OS-Reborn is owned by myself, Brian, Ethan, and Eric. Our goal is to emulate runescape at it’s glorious times and bring you all a game that will hopefully succeed in catering to that goal. We have big plans and an excellent future ahead of us.

[B][U]What makes us different?
[/U][/B]What makes OS-Reborn different from the other runescape remakes? Our main goal is to provide a safe and enjoyable gaming environment for our community. We hope that our users feel safe on our website and enjoy the game just as much as our developers enjoy programming it. We plan on releasing daily updates/patch notes in order to keep the game running smooth and up to date. Our motto is “Power to the players, NOT the staff”. Coming from a professional standard, our viewing of a game depends on the players. What we are trying to say is that, why should we come up with the content? We believe our players should be the holders of that. We will let YOU, the player, decide the future and future content that will be added to OS-Reborn. Every week, we will poll 5 possible content additions and the top 2 will be added into the game.
[SPOILER=Features][LEFT]
[ul][COLOR="#00FF00"]
[]x17.5 xp
[]Grand Exchange
[]Quests
[]10+ Minigames
[]ALL Runescape locations
[]23 Functional Skills
[]Multi-World support
[]Random Events
[]Tutorial Island
[]Music System
[]ALL Runescape dialogues
[]Request Assistance System([URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Assist_System”]See RuneScape Wiki[/URL])
[]Active community events(Player & staff hosted)
[]x17.5 experience rate
[]Boat travelling
[]Gravestone system
[]Falador party room
[]Character appperance
[]Clan Chat
[]Report abuse System
[]ALL Special attacks(with poisoning)
[]Duel arena[/COLOR][/ul]
[/LEFT][/SPOILER]
